analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#70-207) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#136-141)

OVCLockAllocation.releaseTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#414-423) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocation.released == false)

Reentrancy in OVCLockAllocation.releaseTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#414-423):
	External calls:
	- ovc.transfer(msg.sender,allocated) (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol)
allocation in OVCLockAllocation.OVCLockAllocation (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#384) is a local variable never initialiazed
TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x49d09cda1deb8a1680f1270c5ed15218fc4b18f0.sol#78)
